categories: Category:Stormtrooper officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: LX-613 was a Stormtrooper Patrol Leader and sergeant who lived during the Galactic Civil War.

LX-613 appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-roleplaying game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
